content: स्वाभाविक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ स्वभावादागतः ढञ्] Belonging to one's own nature, innate, inherent, peculiar, natural; स्वाभाविकं विनीतत्वं तेषां विनयकर्मणा . मुमूर्च्छ सहजं तेजो हविषेव हविर्भुजां <ls>R. 10. 79</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 69</ls>, <ls>Ku. 6. 71.</ls> --काः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> A sect of Buddhists who accounted for all things by the laws of nature.
